title: Unfinished: A Déjà Rêvé Novel
description: Arthur Quinn is standing in front of his home. He is clueless about his sudden appearance in Coral West, the town he’d left behind. Nothing has changed, except Iris is now staying in his former home.Iris Jaxson is dying. Not to add the fact that she is blind and is slowly losing her other senses too. She decides to spend the two give-or-take months of her life at Coral West. This is her time to be fearless and careless. She doesn’t expect Alec to understand her journey. He doesn’t need to. Because, it’s not his final one.Alec Sage is never going to accept that his best-friend is dying. This is the hardest lesson of his life. A lesson filled with guilt, anger, love, loss and betrayal. How will Alec cope up with this change? Will his fight to hold on be easier? Or should he let Iris go and allow the moment crush his sanity?No odds to fight.No battles to win.No race against time.For time is betraying them all.
author: A.A. Gupte
